history.proof: split. - move=> Hcoh. destruct w as [E Heq]. hauto q: on depth: 3. - move=> [s1 [s2 [Heq [Hcoh1 Hcoh2]]]]. sauto dep: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

Dependent type error in rewrite of (fun _pattern_value_ : world => hook_complete U -> dom U.1 =i dom s1 -> (forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol U l) (getStatelet s1 l)) -> Coh (inj_ext w) s2 -> Coh _pattern_value_ s) Type error was: Illegal application: The term "inj_ext" of type "forall (U V : world) (K : hooks), Injection.injects U V K -> world" cannot be applied to the terms "U" : "world" "_pattern_value_" : "world" "K" : "hooks" "w" : "injects U V K" The 4th term has type "injects U V K" which should be coercible to "Injection.injects U _pattern_value_ K".

original: split. - move=> Hcoh. destruct w as [E Heq]. rewrite Heq in Hcoh. have [s1 [s2 [H1 [H2 H3]]]]: Coh (U \+ E \+ (Unit, K)) s by apply Inject. exists s1, s2. split; first done. + rewrite <- Heq. apply H2. + apply H3. - move=> [s1 [s2 [Heq [Hcoh1 Hcoh2]]]]. rewrite (cohK w) Heq. by apply CohUn.
